ComicInfo.Title: Return of the Shredder (Part 2)
ComicInfo.Summary: Return of the Shredder (Part 2): With Krang demanding results, Shredder breaks Baxter Stockman out of the loony bin to build him the ultimate rat catcher. While the Turtles are out on patrol, Baxter uses his machine to capture Splinter. The Turtles take down their evil impersonators and fight through Shredder and Baxter to free their master. While keeping the existence of the real Turtles secret, April reports that the crooks dressed as giant turtles have been apprehended and the danger to the public is over.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 00:22:22. [CVDB121034] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 19:44:16. [Issue ID 131635]
ComicInfo.Writer: Dave Garcia,Christy Marx,David Wise,Christy Marx,David Wise,Dave Garcia
